items.storedescription: The Orange Turbo is a great choice for installing automotive window tint, paint protection films and vinyl applications. The 5 1/2'' Orange Turbo is a good size for automotive squeegeeing. It is slightly harder than the Yellow Turbo so it helps to eliminate more water. Because the Orange Turbo is firmer than the Yellow Turbo it is a great squeegee to use on films with slower Water Vapor Transmission Rates. Made In The USA
Red Baron Turbo
The 9'' Black Smoothee is the softest Turbo that we carry. Great for installing paint protection film.

The original Titan Tool (A220) has been discontinued by the manufacturer and replaced by their Red Titan Tool (A220R). This new version provides you a longer stiffer alternative to the Conquistador. With a blade length of 14 3/4 inches overall, the Red Titan Tool allows you to get into those hard to reach back window decks. With increased strength at the tip of the the tool you can push out more water than with the old design. The uniquely designed handle allows you to easily lift inner and upper door seals.

ProToolsNow Gator Blade I features arched blades on opposite ends. This blade design allows more scraping pressure for around rear defrosters and for adhesive removal on surfaces where metallic razor blades would scratch surfaces, such as stainless steel and painted surfaces. The ProToolsNow Gator Blade I contours to the shape of auto glass so that it efficiently removes debris & old adhesive. It also aides in pushing down fingers and removing creases. Because Gator Blades are much less likely to cut expensive upholstery or scratch the soft surface of auto glass, they are a fantastic replacement for the hazardous metallic razor blades used by Tinters and Detailers. Made In The USA
Power Stroke Yellow

Our Yellow Turbo Squeegee Blade is the original formulation. The Yellow Turbo is great for installing automotive window tint, paint protection films and vinyl applications. The 18.5 inch Yellow Turbo can be cut down to any size you like. If you are really bored you can try making shapes out of it, we like making snow angels. Made In The USA

items.outofstockmessage: This item has been discontinued by the manufacturer.
items.storedescription: The Basic Yellow Turbo is great for installing automotive window tint, paint protection films and vinyl applications. The "Basic" is not made with our "Original Formulation". We have brought the Basic Turbo in to give our customers a choice in turbos. Made In The USA
items.outofstockbehavior: Disallow back orders but display out-of-stock message

items.storedescription: The Green Turbo is a relatively softer durometer turbo which is great for installing paint protection films and vinyl applications. This is the 18 1/2" version which you can easily cut to any desired length. Made In The USA

The Orange Turbo is great for installing automotive window tint, paint protection films and vinyl applications. The 18.5 inch Orange Turbo can be cut down to any size you like. It is slightly harder than the Yellow Turbo so it helps to eliminate more water. It also works better on the ceramic films. Made In The USA

ProToolsNow Gator Blade II features three functional edges. The first 3.5 linear edge, for those who just have to have a straight edge, is great for lifting bottom roll up gaskets while neatly tucking the film safely beneath to reduce peeling. A long slender acute point works terrifically for reaching into tight corners of quarter or port windows and behind front & rear gaskets of roll-downs and also functions well for lifting & tucking. The three edges of the Gator Blade II offer a variety of radius corners for pressing in specs under the film. Try them out anywhere you would normally use a Chizler from scraping glue, installing or tucking film, ice removal and even cleaning Teflon pans. Made In The USA
The 20" Red Baron Turbo is the hardest turbo that we carry. Hard durometer for all films and types of applications.

The 28" Black Smoothee blade with handle is great all around tool. Whether you are using it for the initial prep work of cleaning the windows or using it as a installation squeegee the 28" Black Smoothee blade will get the job done. Cut the blade down to size to fit all of your installation needs. The Black Smoothee is the softest Turbo that we carry. Some think that it is too soft for installing window film, but it is great for installing paint protection film.
The "Paddle" boasts a 3" wide beveled blade with 13 1/2" of reach for those tough rear window installs. Made from a durable hard plastic that is still slightly flexible for maximum water removal.
The 6" Power Squeegee without angle easily accommodates handle extensions for fast, safe film installations. B192-6 blade is recommended for this handle.
The 8" Power Squeegee w/out Angle easily accommodates handle extensions of any length. B192-8 blade is recommended for this handle.

3M 4'' Blue Bondo can be used as an installation squeegee or wrap it in a soft towel to bump edges dry. Useful for either window film or paint protection film. Harder than the Gray Bondo (A2300GR). Made In The USA
The 4'' Lidco Felt Edge Bondo is great for paint protection installation. Felt edge is much less apt to scratch the film during installation.
6" Lidco Felt Edge Bondo is great for paint protection film installations. Felt edge is much less apt to scratch the film during installation.

The 3M 4" Gold Bondo is the middle range in hardness and our most popular bondo card. Can be used as an installation squeegee or wrap it in a soft towel to bump edges dry. Useful for either window film or paint protection film.  Made In The USA

The 4" Lidco Gray Bondo can be used as an installation squeegee or wrap it in a soft towel to bump edges dry. Useful for either window film or paint protection film. Slightly harder than the white and the orange bondos.  Made in the USA

The 4" Lidco Gray Bondo can be used as an installation squeegee or wrap it in a soft towel to bump edges dry. Useful for either window film or paint protection film. Slightly harder than the white and the orange bondos.  Made in the USA

The 4'' Magnetic Bondo is great for vinyl applications. It looks like a regular black bondo card, but it has a set of strong magnets inside. This tool is designed to not only be used to smooth out the vinyl, but to actually hold the vinyl in place while you are positioning it.  Use item C268 for additional magnets!
This Peach Hard Card is specially formulated to give the card extra slip to slide smoothly over any surface. No scratches just a perfectly carded out film remains.

Have the benefits of a felt edge with any 4" bondo squeegee. This sleeve slides right over your existing bondo cards. Great for paint protection film installations. Felt edge is much less apt to scratch the film during installation.

Have the benefits of a felt edge with any 6" bondo squeegee. This sleeve slides right over your existing bondo cards. Great for paint protection film installations. Felt edge is much less apt to scratch the film during installation.

The Blue Teflon Hard Card is the softest of the "Teflon Group". This extremely flexible card is ideal for laying down the Dot-Matrix area when Matrix Magic (M2739) is used. Allows the user to gently purge the glue out without removing too much. This card is also popular for Paint Protection Film installations.  *Color may vary by batch

The ProToolsNow 4" Black Teflon Card is second to the white hard card in popularity. This card provides a little more flexibility than the white or the gold, but it is stiffer than the blue which makes it great for both flat and curved glass surfaces. Made in the USA
NEW! ProToolsNow 6" Yellow Teflon Card it is softer but it is still big. The same properties of the Yellow Teflon Hard Card with an extra 2" of edge. Made in the USA

Many window film installers say that this extremely popular ProToolsNow 4" Gold Teflon Card provides more friction on film for better gripping during the heat forming process. It is on the high end of "medium" on our flexibility scale, which makes it fantastic for water extraction during squeegeeing or bumping film dry.  Made in the USA
The ProToolsNow 4" Merlot Teflon Card is a mix of stiffness and flexibility. This card is rapidly becoming very popular with installers.  Made in the USA

The hardest of the "Teflon Group". The ProToolsNow 4" Platinum Teflon Card is ideal for heat shrinking because it resists melt down when exposed to heat. Take caution when using this card to install your film. It can scratch the film! It is recommended that you wrap this card when you are using it to "bump" the edges of your tint job.  Made in the USA
The WHITE TEFLON CARD is probably the most popular hard card in the industry. This card is just slightly stiffer than the Gold Teflon Card.  Made in the USA
ProToolsNow 6" White Teflon Card is now bigger and harder. For those times when size and stiffness matters!    Made in the USA
The 4" Universal White Bondo can be used as an installation squeegee or wrap it in a soft towel to bump edges dry. Useful for either window film or paint protection film.

The 4" Lidco Orange Bondo can be used as an installation squeegee or wrap it in a soft towel to bump edges dry. Useful for either window film or paint protection film. Slightly softer than the White Bondo.

The 4" Square Corner Lidco Orange Bondo can be used as an installation squeegee or wrap it in a soft towel to bump edges dry. Useful for either window film or paint protection film. This bondo has square corners unlike the traditional 4" Lidco Orange Bondo. Slightly softer than the White Bondo. Made In The USA
The Lil' Chizler is the original that everyone has known for years. Great for working out fingers on window film the Lil' Chizler also works well in removing decals.
The Chizler is bigger and harder than the Lil' Chizler. This is the stiffest of all of the Chizlers and works great in removing decals and working with window film fingers. MADE IN THE USA
The Yellow Chizler is the softest of the Chizlers and is great for paint protection installs. MADE IN THE USA
The Push Stick, also referred to as "The Bone" is a cheap and easy to use tool, designed to help you get film tucked in behind the gaskets on auto doors.  MADE IN THE USA

A brand new tool to the window tinting industry. This new tool has an wide installation tip for reaching behind gaskets while keeping your hands out of the way. The "Chisel" is 6 1/2" in overall length with approximately 3" of flexible blade. Made of lightweight yet unbelievably  durable plastic. Great for tucking film behind tight door gaskets.

The Equalizer Push Stick is a great tool to help you push the film in behind the gaskets.  If you want even more leverage for this or just want to save your hands check out the Equalizer Handle. MADE IN THEUSA

The Mother Tucker is a great new tucking tool with a 6" handle and a 6"x 1 3/4" usable blade. This tool is great for tucking film behind door gaskets, or for getting into those tight fitting, long reach areas. Chemical resistant, flexible, and an overall length of 12 inches of virtually unbreakable nylon material.

A brand new tool to the window tint industry. This "Shank" may at first glance resemble an ordinary plastic knife, but it is definitely a tough, useful tucking tool. This new tool has an offset installation tip for reaching behind gaskets while keeping your hands out of the way.  It is 7" in overall length with approximately 3" of flexible blade.  Made of lightweight, yet extremely durable plastic, it is great for tucking film behind those tight door gaskets.

The 6" White w/ Black Edge is a popular tinting tool used for many phases of the installation process. Whether you are getting behind the third brake lights, reaching those hard to reach areas or using it to guide the tint into a tough gasket this tool will work wonders for you. This tool has been around for almost 30 years...longer than most tinters have been alive!    MADE IN THEUSA
Save the fatigue on your hands. The 6" Lidco EZ Grip gives you something more substantial to grab onto. Works with any 6" bondo card. Just slide it onto the card to create a much easier grip.

The 12" White w/ Black Edge has just the right length to get behind those third brake lights. Cut it down to size to fit any of your installation needs. Is it white with a black edge or is it a black stripe on white, only you can decide.  MADE IN THE USA
